publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4380 Donald Gorrie on behalf of the Procedures Committee: Procedures relating to Crown Appointments—That the Parliament notes the Procedures Committee’s 2nd Report 2006 (Session 2), Procedures relating to Crown appointments (SP Paper 515) and agrees that the changes to Standing Orders set out in Annexe A to the report be made with effect from 19 May 2006.

S2M-4380 Donald Gorrie on behalf of the Procedures Committee: Procedures relating to Crown Appointments—That the Parliament notes the Procedures Committee’s 2nd Report 2006 (Session 2), Procedures relating to Crown appointments (SP Paper 515) and agrees that the changes to Standing Orders set out in Annexe A to the report be made with effect from 19 May 2006.
S2M-4380 Procedures relating to Crown Appointments (lodged on 11 May 2006) Karen Gillon*
